Created an attachment (id=80042)
An invalid WSDL

Build ID: I20070921-0919

Steps To Reproduce:
1) Create an empty BPEL project.
2) Copy attached WSDL file to the project
3) Create a new BPEL process file
4) Import the WSDL file by the import wizard


The WSDL schema is not valid as it delcares different URIs for the targetNamespace and xmlns:tns attributes (and uses "tns" prefix to access elements defined within the schema)

But I beleive the import wizard should not throw NPE in any case.

The log contains the following entry:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 2 2007-10-10 17:46:56.626
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.jface".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.bpel.ui.adapters.MessageAdapter.getLabel(Unknown Source)
